title: Small town mystery
story: In the small town of Oakhollow, Sarah McCallister disappeared without a trace. The entire community was shocked and confused by her mysterious disappearance. As a reporter for the local newspaper, I was determined to get to the bottom of this puzzling case.

suspect.name: James Hensen
suspect.alibi: James claimed he was at home sleeping at the time of Sarah's disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: Despite his alibi, James' behavior seemed suspicious. He was evasive and avoided eye contact.

witness.name: Evelyn Turner
witness.observation: Evelyn claimed to have seen a shadowy figure near Sarah's house on the night she disappeared.
witness.description: Evelyn was a reliable and respected member of the community.

npcs.name: Sheriff Baker
npcs.dialogue: I've been sheriff of Oakhollow for 10 years and nothing like this has ever happened before. It's a real head scratcher.

npcs.name: Sarah's co-worker, Adam
npcs.dialogue: I can't believe she's gone. She was always so happy and full of life.

clues.Sarah's diary: Sarah's diary revealed that she had been receiving threatening messages from an unknown party.
clues.The abandoned cabin: A local hiker found Sarah's necklace near an abandoned cabin in the woods.
clues.The mysterious car: Several witnesses claimed to have seen a dark sedan parked outside Sarah's house on the night of her disappearance.
clues.Sarah's phone records: Sarah's phone records showed numerous calls to an unknown number in the weeks leading up to her disappearance.
